post: Thank you all for your comments!  I totally agree and have already started working on the redesign of the Main Menu page.  I particularly appreciate the technical suggestions and will include them when I update the site for our 16th anniversary update on January 21, 2012. And no, this is not going to get anyone into trouble with me! The site has needed a face lift for years but other priorities always got in the way. Thanks for giving me a much needed nudge!
